caption.p: Results from controlled experiments. (a) Effects of pyrolysis temperature. (b,c) Effects of second heat treatment at 900 °C: (b) LSV and (c) EIS. (d) Effects of different reagents on the starting materials. The LSV curves were recorded in O 2-saturated 0.1 M KOH with a rotation speed of 1600 rpm and a potential scan rate of 10 mV s –1.
